definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
to have a foot in both camps/to have a bet each way/to be having an affair
(dialect) motorcycle/abbr. to 機車|机车[ji1 che1]
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time

sentences.english: With his feet on the mundane earth, Tripitaka was stunned.
sentences.chinese: 三藏腳踏了凡地，自覺心驚。

sentences.english: Motorcyclists and bicyclists are often the victims in such cases.
sentences.chinese: 機車與腳踏車騎士常常是這種狀況的犧牲者。

sentences.english: Release the Foot Switch when the Calibration Indicator reaches its set position.
sentences.chinese: 當刻度指示器指向規定的位置，放開腳踏板。

sentences.english: Foot switch board has quick lowering function when unload.
sentences.chinese: 腳踏開關板具備空載快速下降功能。

sentences.english: The right peddle of your bicycle has come loose; you'd better fix it.
sentences.chinese: 你的自行車右腳踏板鬆動了，最好修一修。

sentences.english: The Ecraft workh element of Taurus can leadvertisement to strength mainly because well mainly because desire for solid ground form and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座祈望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: It's a long way and maybe we can go there by pedalo.
sentences.chinese: 這條路很長，也許我們可以乘腳踏船到那兒。

sentences.english: You have been two-timing for some time.
sentences.chinese: 你腳踏兩隻船已經很久了。

sentences.english: A clerk has just delivered the token by a bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 站員以腳踏車遞送路牌予司機員以爭取時間。

sentences.english: The Earth element of Taurus brings strength and the desire for solid ground form. and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座渴望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: I am a drummer myself, and what Dave does in this video does not require a double kick pedal at all.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的鼓手，和戴夫在這個視頻不需要雙一腳踏板。

sentences.english: Today's bicycles are descendants of the earlier velocipede.
sentences.chinese: 今天的自行車是從早期的腳踏車發展而來的。

sentences.english: Each of our trouble is a steppingstone.
sentences.chinese: 每一個困難都是你的腳踏石。

sentences.english: So he spent the next four hours painstakingly working with clay to make a tiny bike.
sentences.chinese: 於是他花了四個小時小心翼翼地用黏土做微型腳踏車。

definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to hang in the air/suspended in midair/(fig.) uncertain
steps/flight of steps/step (over obstacle)/fig. way out of an embarrassing situation/bench (geology)
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
